name: Penguin Land (itch)
description:
This is a project I decided to try after seeing a GDC talk on youtube. 

Your goal is to feed all of the female penguins the fruit. Just be careful: if you press the fruit against the wall, it gets squished and you lose.

More levels will come eventually but for right now there are 5 levels to complete.

Please report any bugs, issues, or improvement ideas here.
